trans-unit.source: This interface allows an application to capture a message before it is dispatched to a control or form.
trans-unit.target: 此接口允许应用程序捕获一条消息，然后它将被调度到的控件或窗体。

trans-unit.source: A class that implements the IMessageFilter interface can be added to the application's message pump to filter out a message or perform other operations before the message is dispatched to a form or control.
trans-unit.target: 实现 IMessageFilter 接口的类可以添加到应用程序的消息泵来筛选出一条消息或执行其他操作之前将消息调度到窗体或控件。

trans-unit.source: To add the message filter to an application's message pump, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.AddMessageFilter%2A> method in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要将消息筛选器添加到应用程序的消息泵，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.AddMessageFilter%2A>方法中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.AddMessageFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Filters out a message before it is dispatched.
trans-unit.target: 筛选出之前并在调度消息。

trans-unit.source: Use PreFilterMessage to filter out a message before it is dispatched to a control or form.
trans-unit.target: 使用 PreFilterMessage 筛选出一条消息之前它将被调度到的控件或窗体。

trans-unit.source: For example, to stop the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control from being dispatched to the control, you implement the PreFilterMessage method and return a `true` value when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> message occurs.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要停止<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件被调度到控件，你实现 PreFilterMessage 方法并返回`true`值时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>消息时发生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to perform code work that you might need to do before the message is dispatched.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还可用于执行代码可能需要在调度消息前的准备工作的工作。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to filter the message and stop it from being dispatched; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow the message to continue to the next filter or control.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要筛选消息并使其不再被调度;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>允许消息继续到达下一个筛选器或控件。
